nodes.text: Bekhaj was a male Evocii who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

During the war, he worked as a merchant on the planet Nal Hutta, the homeworld of his species previously known as Evocar, but taken over and renamed by the Hutt species who adopted it as their homeworld. On Hutta he owned a small stall near the entrance to Jiguuna, an industrial town controlled by a Hutt crime lord named Suudaa Nem'ro. The stall consisted of a series of shelves filled with the goods he sold, which included stims and medpacs As all merchants in Jiguuna were, Bekhaj was expected to pay some of his profits from his stall to one of Nem'ro's lieutenants at the crime lord's palace. Whilst at the stall the Evocii wore a piece of head-wear which revealed the top of his head as well as brown clothing. Bekhaj had pale yellow skin, blue eyes and was bald.

Bekhaj first appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He appears as a stims vendor on the planet Nal Hutta, the starting planet for players of the bounty hunter and Imperial Agent class.
